original: @116a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @116a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya aa tsa la kro dha r'a dza sto tra /
analyzed: a'arya aa tsa la kro dha r'a dza sto tra /
translated: Ārya-acala-krodharājastotra

original: bod skad du /🔽khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa mi g-yo ba la bstod pa /
analyzed: bod skad du / khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa mi g-yo ba la bstod pa /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽Praise to the Noble King of Wrathful Ones, Acala

original: khro bo'i rgyal po mi g-yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po mi g-yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the King of Wrathful Ones, Acala.

original: mi g-yo zhes bya'i khro bo ni //🔽ral gri zhags pa legs par thogs //
analyzed: mi g-yo zhes bya'i khro bo ni // ral gri zhags pa legs par thogs //
translated: The wrathful one called Acala,🔽Wielding a sword and noose,

original: spyi bo'i zur phung g-yon du 'khyil //
analyzed: spyi bo'i zur phung g-yon du 'khyil //
translated: With hair swirling to the left on the crown of his head,

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor 'od la bzhugs //🔽klu chen la sogs thams cad kyi //
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor 'od la bzhugs // klu chen la sogs thams cad kyi //
translated: Resides in the light of his own mandala.🔽Adorned with all the ornaments

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu brgyan //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu brgyan //
translated: Of the great nāgas and so forth,

original: byis pa'i gzugs can 'gying bag can //
analyzed: byis pa'i gzugs can 'gying bag can //
translated: With the form of a youth, graceful,

original: rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the vajra body.

original: dpal ldan nang na thugs rje'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: dpal ldan nang na thugs rje'i rang bzhin can //
translated: Endowed with compassion within the glorious ones,

original: gdug pa 'dul phyir phyi rol khro tshul ston //
analyzed: gdug pa 'dul phyir phyi rol khro tshul ston //
translated: Displaying an external wrathful manner to subdue the wicked,

original: chos nyid mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing nag zhal //
analyzed: chos nyid mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing nag zhal //
translated: With a face of unchanging dharmatā, dark blue in color,

original: bcom ldan mi g-yo mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan mi g-yo mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Bhagavān, the protector Acala.

original: thugs rje'i dbyings nas bzhengs pa'i sku mchog ni //
analyzed: thugs rje'i dbyings nas bzhengs pa'i sku mchog ni //
translated: The supreme form that arises from the realm of compassion,

original: ye shes me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na //
analyzed: ye shes me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na //
translated: In the midst of a blazing mass of wisdom fire,

original: sna tshogs padma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs //
translated: He sits upon a variegated lotus and sun seat.

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag rngam pa'i sku //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag rngam pa'i sku //
translated: He has one face, two hands, and a dark-blue wrathful body.

original: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bgegs chen du ma gzir //
analyzed: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bgegs chen du ma gzir //
translated: His two legs are extended and contracted, trampling on many great obstructors.

original: stag dang sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: stag dang sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: He is adorned with ornaments of tigers and snakes.

original: lha dang @116b lha min skrag mdzad phyag g-yas na //
analyzed: lha dang @116b lha min skrag mdzad phyag g-yas na //
translated: With his right hand, he terrifies gods and demigods

original: shes rab ral gri 'bar ba 'debs pa'i tshul //
analyzed: shes rab ral gri 'bar ba 'debs pa'i tshul //
translated: By brandishing a blazing sword of wisdom.

original: 'byung po skrag mdzad phyag g-yon sdigs mdzub ste //
analyzed: 'byung po skrag mdzad phyag g-yon sdigs mdzub ste //
translated: With his left hand, he terrifies bhūta spirits with a threatening gesture.

original: thugs rjes lus can mi gtor rdo rje zhags //
analyzed: thugs rjes lus can mi gtor rdo rje zhags //
translated: Out of compassion, he does not abandon embodied beings, holding a vajra noose.

original: skye shi rtsad gcod rno dkar mche ba gcigs //
analyzed: skye shi rtsad gcod rno dkar mche ba gcigs //
translated: He chews a fresh human corpse, severing birth and death.

original: spyan gnyis dmar zlum thugs rjes phyogs bcur gzigs ;
analyzed: spyan gnyis dmar zlum thugs rjes phyogs bcur gzigs ;
translated: His two eyes are red and round, gazing compassionately in the ten directions.

original: / thugs rjes khros pas dbu skra gyen du 'khyil //
analyzed: / thugs rjes khros pas dbu skra gyen du 'khyil //
translated: His hair swirls upward in wrathful compassion.

original: mi bskyod la sogs rigs lngas dbul brgyan //
analyzed: mi bskyod la sogs rigs lngas dbul brgyan //
translated: He is adorned with the five families, Akṣobhya and so forth.

original: ma rungs 'dul zhing 'gro don rdzogs mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: ma rungs 'dul zhing 'gro don rdzogs mdzad pa'i //
translated: He tames the unruly and fulfills the welfare of beings.

original: sprul pa'i khro rgyal sna tshogs sku las 'phro //
analyzed: sprul pa'i khro rgyal sna tshogs sku las 'phro //
translated: From the various emanated wrathful kings,

original: 'gro bkun gyi sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing //
analyzed: 'gro bkun gyi sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing //
translated: You pacify the suffering of all migrating beings,

original: bde bdag la rim gyis mgon mdzad pa //
analyzed: bde bdag la rim gyis mgon mdzad pa //
translated: And gradually bestow happiness upon them.

original: 'gro ba'i mgon po shin tu thugs rje can //🔽khyod nyid dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad lags //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i mgon po shin tu thugs rje can // khyod nyid dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad lags //
translated: You are the protector of migrating beings, endowed with great compassion,🔽You are all the buddhas of the three times.

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad khyod lags pas //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad khyod lags pas //
translated: All the buddhas of the three times are you,

original: khro rgyal ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: khro rgyal ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: So I pay homage and praise the wisdom body of the wrathful king.

original: 'jigs byed drag po'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: 'jigs byed drag po'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the fierce and terrifying speech.

original: gnyis med rtse gcig thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: gnyis med rtse gcig thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the nondual, one-pointed mind.

original: bdag kyang khyod ltar 'gro don bgyi slad du //
analyzed: bdag kyang khyod ltar 'gro don bgyi slad du //
translated: In order to benefit migrating beings like you,

original: rtse gcig sems kyis khyod bsgom gsang sngags bzlas //
analyzed: rtse gcig sems kyis khyod bsgom gsang sngags bzlas //
translated: I meditate on you with one-pointed mind and recite the secret mantra.

original: dus rnams rtag tu khro rgyal khyod bsten na //🔽thugs rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs mdzad de //
analyzed: dus rnams rtag tu khro rgyal khyod bsten na // thugs rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs mdzad de //
translated: If I always rely on you, the wrathful king,🔽You will bestow your great compassion and

original: ye shes sku mchog mngon sum stsal nas kyang ;
analyzed: ye shes sku mchog mngon sum stsal nas kyang ;
translated: Grant the supreme wisdom body in actuality.

original: / sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol //
analyzed: / sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol //
translated: Grant me the attainments of body, speech, and mind!

original: sgrub la bar chad byed pa'i bdud dgra rnams //
analyzed: sgrub la bar chad byed pa'i bdud dgra rnams //
translated: The māras and enemies who create obstacles for the practice

original: pha rol 'joms pa'i stobs kyis med par mdzod //
analyzed: pha rol 'joms pa'i stobs kyis med par mdzod //
translated: Must be destroyed by the power of conquering the enemy!

original: dus 'di nas bzung byang chub snying po'i bar //
analyzed: dus 'di nas bzung byang chub snying po'i bar //
translated: From this time forward until the essence of enlightenment,

original: lha mchog khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: lha mchog khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
translated: I go for refuge to you, supreme deity.

original: dus rnams rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung du gsol //
analyzed: dus rnams rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung du gsol //
translated: Please always protect me!

original: khro bo'i rgyal po mi g-yo ba la bstod pa /
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po mi g-yo ba la bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Immutable King of Wrath🔽by Pandit Dipamkarasrijñana

original: pandi ta d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: pandi ta d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: is complete.🔽Translated, edited, and finalized by the same translator and

original: // / pandi de nyid dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: // / pandi de nyid dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: the monk Tsultrim Gyalwa.
